Java

jar_app_layer

Usage

jar_app_layer(name, architecture, base, binary, build_layer, cmd, compression, compression_options, create_image_config, creation_time, data, data_path, debs, deps, directory, docker_run_flags, empty_dirs, empty_files, enable_mtime_preservation, entrypoint, env, experimental_tarball_format, extract_config, files, incremental_load_template, jar_layers, jvm_flags, label_file_strings, label_files, labels, launcher, launcher_args, layers, legacy_repository_naming, legacy_run_behavior, main_class, mode, mtime, null_cmd, null_entrypoint, operating_system, os_version, portable_mtime, ports, repository, runtime_deps, sha256, stamp, symlinks, tars, user, volumes, workdir)

name

(name, mandatory): A unique name for this target.

architecture

(String)

Defaults to "amd64"

base

(label, mandatory)

binary

(label, mandatory)

build_layer

(label)

Defaults to //container:build_tar

cmd

(List of strings)

Defaults to []

compression

(String)

Defaults to "gzip"

compression_options

(List of strings)

Defaults to []

create_image_config

(label)

Defaults to //container/go/cmd/create_image_config:create_image_config

creation_time

(String)

Defaults to ""

data

(labels)

Defaults to []

data_path

(String)

Defaults to "."

debs

(labels)

Defaults to []

deps

(labels)

Defaults to []

directory

(String)

Defaults to "/app"

docker_run_flags

(String)

Defaults to ""

empty_dirs

(List of strings)

Defaults to []

empty_files

(List of strings)

Defaults to []

enable_mtime_preservation

(Boolean)

Defaults to False

entrypoint

(List of strings)

Defaults to []

env

(Dictionary: String -> String)

Defaults to {}

experimental_tarball_format

(String): The tarball format to use when producing an image .tar file. Defaults to “legacy”, which contains uncompressed layers. If set to “compressed”, the resulting tarball will contain compressed layers, but is only loadable by newer versions of docker. This is an experimental attribute, which is subject to change or removal: do not depend on its exact behavior.

Defaults to "legacy"

extract_config

(label)

Defaults to //container/go/cmd/extract_config:extract_config

files

(labels)

Defaults to []

incremental_load_template

(label)

Defaults to //container:incremental_load_template

jar_layers

(labels)

Defaults to []

jvm_flags

(List of strings)

Defaults to []

label_file_strings

(List of strings)

Defaults to []

label_files

(labels)

Defaults to []

labels

(Dictionary: String -> String)

Defaults to {}

launcher

(label)

Defaults to None

launcher_args

(List of strings)

Defaults to []

layers

(labels)

Defaults to []

legacy_repository_naming

(Boolean)

Defaults to False

legacy_run_behavior

(Boolean)

Defaults to False

main_class

(String)

Defaults to ""

mode

(String)

Defaults to "0o555"

mtime

(Integer)

Defaults to -1

null_cmd

(Boolean)

Defaults to False

null_entrypoint

(Boolean)

Defaults to False

operating_system

(String)

Defaults to "linux"

os_version

(String)

Defaults to ""

portable_mtime

(Boolean)

Defaults to False

(List of strings)

Defaults to []

repository

(String)

Defaults to "bazel"

(labels)

Defaults to []

(label)

Defaults to //tools/build_defs/hash:sha256

stamp

(Boolean)

Defaults to False

(Dictionary: String -> String)

(String)

Defaults to ""

(List of strings)

Defaults to []

(String)

jar_dep_layer

java_files

Filter out the list of java source files from the given list of runfiles.

Usage

java_files(f)

f

Runfiles for a java_image rule.

java_files_with_data

Filter out the list of java source and data files from the given list of runfiles.

Usage

java_files_with_data(f)

f

Runfiles for a java_image rule.

java_image

Builds a container image overlaying the java_binary.

Usage

java_image(name, base, main_class, deps, runtime_deps, layers, jvm_flags, kwargs)

name

Name of the image target.

base

Base image to use for the java image.

Defaults to None

main_class

This parameter is optional. If provided it will be used in the compilation of any additional sources, and as part of the construction of the container entrypoint. If not provided, the name parameter is used as the main_class when compiling any additional sources, and the main_class is not included in the construction of the container entrypoint. Omitting main_class allows the user to specify additional arguments to the JVM at runtime.

Defaults to None

deps

Dependencies of the java image rule.

Defaults to []

runtime_deps

Runtime dependencies of the java image.

Defaults to []

layers

Augments “deps” with dependencies that should be put into their own layers.

Defaults to []

jvm_flags

Flags to pass to the JVM when running the java image.

Defaults to []

kwargs

See java_binary.

war_image

Builds a container image overlaying the java_library as an exploded WAR.

TODO(mattmoor): For bazel run of this to be useful, we need to be able to ctrl-C it and have the container actually terminate. More information: https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/3519

Usage

war_image(name, base, deps, layers, kwargs)

name

Name of the war_image target.

base

Base image to use for the war image.

Defaults to None

deps

Dependencies of the way image target.

Defaults to []

layers

Augments “deps” with dependencies that should be put into their own layers.

Defaults to []

kwargs

See java_library.
